archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Guide Party Billing Event
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Ensure an event used in the billing processes are related to the correct party billing account and subscribed products.

properties.value: Guide Party Billing Event ensure that an event used in the billing process relate to the correct party billing account and products. An event may be related to multiple party billing accounts and subscribed products. Distribution of the billing event to other processes may also occur.
